name: assigned U at birth
definition: An assignment of an 'U' gender shortly after birth. Note that 'U' is only available in certain jurisdictions on birth certificates.

name: assigned X at birth
definition: An assignment of an 'X' gender shortly after birth. Note that 'X' is only available in certain jurisdictions on birth certificates.

name: assigned diverse at birth
definition: An assignment of a diverse gender marker shortly after birth. Note that 'diverse' is only available in certain jurisdictions on birth certificates. Further, note that 'diverse' itself is not a gender, but is a legal gender in this context.

name: assigned eunuch at birth
definition: An assignment of a 'eunuch' gender marker shortly after birth. Note that 'eunuch' is only available in certain jurisdictions on birth certificates. Further, note that 'eunuch' itself is not a gender, but is a legal gender in this context. This term may also be offensive depending on the context.

name: assigned female at birth
definition: An assignment of a female gender shortly after birth.

name: assigned indeterminate at birth
definition: An assignment of an indeterminate gender marker shortly after birth. Note that 'indeterminate' is only available in certain jurisdictions on birth certificates. Further, note that 'indeterminate' itself is not a gender, but is a legal gender in this context.

name: assigned intersex at birth
definition: An assignment of an intersex gender marker shortly after birth. Note that 'intersex' is only available in certain jurisdictions on birth certificates. Further, note that 'intersex' itself is not a gender, but is a legal gender in this context.

name: assigned male at birth
definition: An assignment of a male gender shortly after birth.

name: assigned no gender at birth
definition: Use in situations where no gender was assigned at birth, i.e. no birth certificate was issued shortly after birth or no birth certificate gender was recorded.

name: assigned nonbinary at birth
definition: An assignment of a nonbinary gender shortly after birth. Note that 'nonbinary' is only available in certain jurisdictions on birth certificates.

name: assigned other at birth
definition: An assignment of an 'other' gender marker shortly after birth. Note that 'other' is only available in certain jurisdictions on birth certificates.

name: assigned third gender at birth
definition: An assignment of a 'third gender' gender marker shortly after birth. Note that 'third gender' is only available in certain jurisdictions on birth certificates. Further, note that 'third gender' itself is not a gender, but is a legal gender in this context. This term may also be offensive depending on the context.

name: assigned unspecified at birth
definition: An assignment of an 'unspecified' gender shortly after birth. Note that 'unspecified' is only available in certain jurisdictions on birth certificates.
